attributes.action: Secure Richard Littlejohn an honour in recognition of his tireless service to journalism in the UK for the last 20 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is put forward to honour the work done by Richard Littlejohn as a free speech advocate and tireless journalist who promotes debate and discussion with his forthright and honest writing skills.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
